hook: No one explains this about your mind.
script:
HOOK (0–3s):
No one explains this about your mind.

MAIN (3–50s):
Most people don’t realize that psychology facts people don’t realize.
Your brain filters reality to save energy.
That means it deletes details, distorts time,
and prioritizes comfort over truth.
This isn’t a flaw — it’s survival.

CTA (last 5s):
Once you see this, you can’t unsee it.
captions: No one explains this about your mind.
post_caption: No one explains this about your mind. #psychology #mind #didyouknow #shorts
